titles.title: A concurrent resolution recognizing Father Terry Attridge and the DARE program for their contributions to the fight against drug and alcohol abuse.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 3/24/1987--Introduced. Honors Father Terry Attridge and the DARE program for their contributions to the fight against alcohol and drug abuse.
